shri lankawa hamawitama sahodarayek ha sagayek bawa pawasu janadhipathi yamin mathithuma me mahangi mitha‡∑ärathwaya gana behewin kruthagnya wana bawa sandahan kaleya.saukhyaya, sancharaka wyaparaya, guwan sewa, pudgala sankramanaya saha aarakshaka sewa yana kshethrawala dwiparshwika sabandatha thawath shakthimath kirima athuluwa deratata wadagath wana ansha gananawaka sahayogitha wardhanaya pilibandawa dwiparshwika sakachchawe di ek wu dutha piris adahas huwamaru kara gathha.shri lankawa usas adhyapanayata unandu wana maladiwayin sisun athara priyathama ratak bawath saukhya pahasukam laba ganime di boho wita palamu therima bawath penwa dun yamin janadhipathithuma danata shri lankawe wesena maladiwayin janaya udesa saukhya ha adhyapana pahasukam pulul karannayi illimak kaleya.dhiwara karmanthaya pilibandawa dirgha washayen sakachcha kerina.
